data.rationale: Code review completed 2025-12-26: 4.5/5 rating. Architecture is clean (Facade pattern), 96% test coverage, excellent documentation, secure implementation (no code injection vectors). Minor issues: 1) encapsulation break in force_mode, 2) silent exception in scheduler, 3) missing thread-safety docs. All low priority. Production-ready.
data.title: Woven Mind v1.0 approved for release after comprehensive code review
